data.actual_result: App stays wherever you left it when you stopped scrolling up.
data.expected_result: The app should scroll down to the bottom automatically.
data.short_description: Sending a message or a file after scrolling up a little bit in a text channel will cause the app to not scroll down to the bottom of the channel automatically.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into any text channel with a considerable amount of messages - Scroll up a little bit in the channel - Send a message or a file.
